fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Select a player at night to kill.
Attributes: You will deal a Basic Attack to them.
If all of the players you attacked tonight die, you have to kill another player each night.
If any of your victims survive, you cannot attack for two nights and your attacks per night resets to one.
You ignore abilities that stop attacks or stop visits or grant defense that come from one of your targets.
